messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] new support groups
messages.msgSnippet: I have to say one of the most positive things that has happened out of email-land in the past couple of weeks was the Mom who called me in my area to say she
messages.messageBody:
I have to say one of the most positive things that has happened out of
email-land in the past couple of weeks was the Mom who called me in my area to say
she was thinking of starting up a support group! I think because of things she
had read on this list! So, not only do I really hope a group (however small
and informal) comes together near me, but I hope we hear about others doing
their thing!

Nance


In a message dated 6/30/2004 4:49:34 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
Go for it! "Advertise" on all the homeshcool groups in the province.
> They'll come out of the woodwork! You'll have regular park days and trips
> and .....!
>
> ~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
